snippet: Gunmen attacked the headquarters of the South Western State government in Baidoa, killing at least four government soldiers and two civilians, a Somali official said Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen attacked the headquarters of the South Western State government in Baidoa, killing at least four government soldiers and two civilians, a Somali official said Thursday.

headline.main: Somalia: Gunmen Attack State Government’s Headquarters
headline.print_headline: Somalia: Gunmen Attack State Government’s Headquarters
